Our offer

Custom development

  • Technical blueprint and proof-of-concept
  • Quick iteration cycles and total transparency
  • Production-grade code with documentation and tests

Mentoring and training

  • Training sessions on specific technologies or paradigms
  • Pair programming and mentorship

Technical leadership

  • Advising on architecture and tools
  • Establishing best practices and code quality processes
  • Ensuring consistent quality of software

Supported technologies

Scala

  • For high-performance backend code, complex logic and maximum throughput
  • Enables transition to big-data processing through Spark
  • 7 years professional experience

Python

  • A rich common ground for scientists and programmers
  • The fastest way to go from research to production
  • Ability to run on the cloud as serverless or with PySpark

Serverless

  • Deployment on Google Functions or AWS Lambda
  • Development of rich applications on the browser
  • Choice of client-side frameworks: Angular, ScalaJS, Purescript

Excel

  • Development of add-ins based on web technologies
  • Deploy business logic on a server: lightweight processing within Excel

Rust

  • Desktop or server side heavy processing
  • Low latency: no garbage collection
  • Memory and thread safety

Business Domains

Systematic trading

  • Experience with all the stages of systematic trading, from data gathering and cleaning to execution system and performance evaluation

Risk management

  • Interfacing with position keeping and portfolio management tools, we can develop personalised stress tests and scenario matrices, with cloud-based concurrent evaluation and advanced visualisation options

Derivative pricing

  • Scala implementation of advanced numerical methods for derivative pricing
  • Experience with high-performance derivatives evaluation with cloud parallel processing
